programme.title: Most Daring - Fighting For Your Life (Season 2, Episode 12)
programme.desc: A man will go over the edge of Niagara Falls if rescuers don't save him in time. Plus, a lion tamer must free his brother from a savage attack by one of his charges.

programme.title: Most Daring - Dangerous Duos (Season 5, Episode 2)
programme.desc: Two generations of a crime family rob a bank, then run into the police; men trying to elude the law encounter a roadblock; a store clerk confronts armed juveniles.

programme.title: Most Daring - High Risk Rescues (Season 7, Episode 2)
programme.desc: A base jump gone-wrong leaves a thrill-seeker stuck on a cliff; firefighters rush into a burning house to save a family; a paramedic scrambles to save a teen crushed beneath a school bus.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles (Season 5, Episode 15)
programme.desc: Fists fly during a lingerie football league match and a dance contest gets vicious when one competitor hogs the stage.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#101) (Season 1, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A defendant leaps over a balcony headfirst in a death-defying escape attempt; a man accused of murdering his girlfriend's 4-year old son has an unlikely defender: his girlfriend;

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#102) (Season 1, Episode 2)
programme.desc: A mourning father makes a desperate attempt to attack his daughter's killer; a judge takes off his robe to help subdue an unruly defendant; a defendant tries to sing his way to a lighter sentence; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#103) (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: A defendant wields an unlikely weapon, and pays the ultimate price; a judge chases down two escaping defendants; a convicted murderer's smile in court could put him in prison for the rest of his life; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#104) (Season 1, Episode 4)
programme.desc: A suspected murderer slashes his own throat in court; a foul-mouthed defendant lets loose on the judge; a young woman tries to save the life of the man who is suing her family; and more.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After the First 48 - 17 (Season 1, Episode 12)
programme.desc: In March of 2008, Tucson Detectives Jennifer Whitfield and Mike Carroll were called to investigate the robbery/homicide of a 27-year-old cab driver.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Signs of Violence (Season 2, Episode 1)
programme.desc: One man was part of a love triangle, the other a complete stranger--both were murdered a week apart.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Torn (Season 2, Episode 4)
programme.desc: In February of 2009, 21-year-old James "Jamo" Allen was gunned down outside of a Louisville, Kentucky housing project.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Letters of Intent / Family Friend (Season 1, Episode 10)
programme.desc: In Dallas, Texas in 2007 Darell Billingsela was charged with brutally attacking and killing twenty-two-year-old Jessica Lewalling in a jealous rage. Billingslea was a two-time convicted murderer out on parole.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Nightmare/Birthday Girl (Season 5, Episode 5)
programme.desc: In Cleveland, a 14-year-old girl was gunned down at her own birthday party when rival gangs opened fire.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Kiss of Death (Season 6, Episode 4)
programme.desc: A man is brutally gunned down on a neighborhood street in Rochester, New York. Investigators believe his estranged wife, a prostitute, is lying to them about his murder.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After the First 48 - 17 (Season 1, Episode 12)
programme.desc: In March of 2008, Tucson Detectives Jennifer Whitfield and Mike Carroll were called to investigate the robbery/homicide of a 27-year-old cab driver.
